scripts.index: . ../env.sh; APPSEARCH_PRIVATE=`aws secretsmanager get-secret-value --secret-id $APPSEARCH_SECRET |jq -r '.SecretString | fromjson | .appsearchPrivateKey'` AWS_REGION=eu-west-1 node --max-old-space-size=2400 --unhandled-rejections=strict index.js
